component.name: VutronMusic
component.summary: High UI-quality third-party NetEase Cloud Music player
高颜值的第三方网易云播放器

description.p: A third-party NetEase Cloud Music player with a high-quality user interface; supports streaming music services like Navidrome, Jellyfin, and Emby; supports local music playback, offline playlists, karaoke lyrics, desktop lyrics, Touch Bar lyrics, Mac status bar lyrics display, Linux-GNOME desktop status bar lyrics display; also supports pitch shifting and speed adjustment.
高颜值的第三方网易云播放器；支持流媒体音乐，如navidrome、jellyfin、emby；支持本地音乐播放、离线歌单、逐字歌词、桌面歌词、Touch Bar歌词、Mac状态栏歌词显示、Linux-gnome桌面状态栏歌词显示；支持降调降速等。
